pages.text: $(li)The Bulwark Of the Flame is the most resistant shield that you can make.$(br)$(li)When you have it equipped, it gives you you the $(l:patchouli:potions/quark/fortitude)Resistance $(/l)effect reducing any physical damage that you take.

pages.name: Bulwark Of the Flame
pages.text: This item can't be burned in fire or lava and it doesn't have durability.
